structuralTraits.name: Silver Tongue
structuralTraits.description: An Advozse gains a +5 species bonus on Persuasion checks.

conditionalTraits.name: Silver Tongue (Reroll)
conditionalTraits.description: An Advozse may reroll any Persuasion check, but must accept the result of the reroll even if it is worse.

rules.description: An Advozse may reroll any Persuasion check, but must accept the result of the reroll even if it is worse.

structuralTraits.name: Small Size
structuralTraits.description: As a Small creature, an Aleena gains a +5 species bonus to Stealth checks and a +1 species bonus to Reflex Defense, but takes a -5 penalty on grapple checks.

conditionalTraits.name: Ferocity
conditionalTraits.description: When reduced to half hit points or fewer, an Aqualish gains a +2 species bonus on melee attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the encounter.

structuralTraits.name: Darkvision
structuralTraits.description: An Arkanian ignores concealment caused by darkness.

rules.description: An Arkanian ignores concealment caused by darkness.

structuralTraits.name: Genetic Memory
structuralTraits.description: An Arkanian gains a +2 species bonus on Knowledge (life sciences) checks.

structuralTraits.name: Resilient Physiology
structuralTraits.description: An Arkanian Offshoot gains a +2 species bonus to Fortitude Defense.

activatedAbilities.name: Toxic Breath
activatedAbilities.description: As a standard action, a Balosar may emit toxic gas; creatures adjacent to the Balosar take a -2 penalty on attack rolls until the end of the Balosar's next turn.

conditionalTraits.name: Reptilian Ferocity
conditionalTraits.description: When reduced to half hit points or fewer, a Barabel gains a +2 species bonus on attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the encounter.

structuralTraits.name: Musical Savant
structuralTraits.description: A Bith gains a +5 species bonus on Perform checks.

structuralTraits.name: Fragile
structuralTraits.description: A Bith takes a -2 species penalty to Fortitude Defense.

conditionalTraits.name: Battle Rage
conditionalTraits.description: When a Blood Carver takes damage, it gains a +2 species bonus on melee damage rolls until the end of its next turn.

conditionalTraits.name: Bothan Spy Network
conditionalTraits.description: A Bothan may reroll any Gather Information check, but must accept the result of the reroll even if it is worse.

rules.description: A Bothan may reroll any Gather Information check, but must accept the result of the reroll even if it is worse.

structuralTraits.description: A Caamasi gains a +5 species bonus on Initiative checks.

structuralTraits.description: A Cathar gains a +2 species bonus to Reflex Defense.

structuralTraits.description: A Celegian may use the Force even without formal Force training.

structuralTraits.description: A Chiss ignores concealment caused by darkness.

activatedAbilities.name: Shapeshifter
activatedAbilities.description: As a full-round action, a Clawdite may alter its appearance to resemble any Medium humanoid.

structuralTraits.description: A Codru-Ji gains a +2 species bonus on grapple checks.

structuralTraits.description: A Dathomirian gains a +2 species bonus on Use the Force checks.

conditionalTraits.name: Expert Pilot
conditionalTraits.description: As natural spacers, a Duros may choose to reroll any Pilot check, but the result of the reroll must be accepted even if it is worse.

structuralTraits.name: Frail Build

structuralTraits.description: An Elomin gains a +2 species bonus on Mechanics checks.

structuralTraits.description: An Ewok gains proficiency with primitive weapons.

activatedAbilities.name: Pheromones
activatedAbilities.description: As a standard action, a Falleen may impose a -2 penalty to Will Defense on all living creatures within 6 squares until the end of the encounter.

structuralTraits.name: Force Sensitivity
structuralTraits.description: A Felucian may use the Force even if it does not have the Force Sensitivity feat.

structuralTraits.description: A Feeorin gains a +5 species bonus on Intimidate checks.

structuralTraits.name: Regeneration
structuralTraits.description: A Gen'Dai automatically regains hit points equal to its level at the start of each turn unless damaged by fire or acid.

structuralTraits.name: Wings
structuralTraits.description: A Geonosian may fly with a speed of 6 squares (clumsy).

structuralTraits.name: Hive Mind
structuralTraits.description: A Geonosian gains a +2 species bonus on Initiative checks.

structuralTraits.description: A Givin gains a +5 species bonus on Mechanics and Knowledge (physical sciences) checks.

structuralTraits.description: A Gotal gains blindsense out to 6 squares.

structuralTraits.description: A Houk gains a +2 species bonus on melee attack rolls.

name: Kel Dor

notes: A Kel Dor must wear a breath mask to survive in oxygen-rich atmospheres.

structuralTraits.name: Stocky Build
structuralTraits.description: A Lannik gains a +2 species bonus to Fortitude Defense.

structuralTraits.name: Pacifist Resolve
structuralTraits.description: A Lurmen gains a +2 species bonus to Will Defense.

structuralTraits.description: A Massassi gains a +2 species bonus on melee damage rolls.

structuralTraits.name: Ability Modifiers
structuralTraits.description: All Mantellian Savrips receive a +4 bonus to both their Strength and Constitution, but suffer -4 penalties to their Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma, as well as a -2 penalty to their Dexterity.

structuralTraits.name: Large Size
structuralTraits.description: As Large creatures, Mantellian Savrips take a -1 size penalty to their Reflex Defense and a -5 size penalty on Stealth checks, and they gain a +5 size bonus to their Damage Threshold. Their lifting and carrying limits are double those of Medium characters.

structuralTraits.name: Speed
structuralTraits.description: Mantellian Savrips have a base speed of 8 squares.

structuralTraits.name: Natural Armor
structuralTraits.description: Mantellian Savrips gain a +2 Natural Armor bonus to their Reflex Defense. A Natural Armor bonus stacks with an Armor bonus.

structuralTraits.name: Natural Weapons
structuralTraits.description: A Mantellian Savrip has Natural Weapons, in the form of tough claws. When making an Unarmed attack, it may choose to use its Natural Weapons, dealing 1d6 points of Slashing damage instead of normal Unarmed damage. Mantellian Savrips are always considered armed with their Natural Weapons.

structuralTraits.name: Poison
structuralTraits.description: If the Natural Weapons of a Mantellian Savrip deal damage to a living target, the target is also Poisoned. If the Poison succeeds on an attack roll (1d20 + Character Level) against the target's Fortitude Defense, the target moves -1 step along the Condition Track. A target moved to the end of the Condition Track by the Poison is Immobilized, but not Unconscious.

structuralTraits.name: Primitive
structuralTraits.description: Mantellian Savrips do not gain Weapon Proficiency (Heavy Weapons), Weapon Proficiency (Pistols), or Weapon Proficiency (Rifles) as starting Feats at first level, even if their Class normally grants them.

structuralTraits.name: Automatic Languages
structuralTraits.description: All Mantellian Savrips can speak Savrip.

activatedAbilities.name: Rage
activatedAbilities.description: Once per day, a Mantellian Savrip can fly into a Rage as a Swift Action. While Raging, the Mantellian Savrip temporarily gains a +2 Rage bonus on melee attack rolls and melee damage rolls, but cannot use Skills that require patience and concentration (Mechanics, Stealth, Use the Force). A fit of Rage lasts for a number of rounds equal to 5 + the Mantellian Savrip's Constitution modifier. At the end of its Rage, the Mantellian Savrip moves -1 Persistent step along the Condition Track. The penalties persist until the Mantellian Savrip takes at least 10 minutes to recuperate.

structuralTraits.name: Force Sight
structuralTraits.description: A Miraluka is blind but perceives the world through the Force, ignoring concealment from darkness.

rules.description: A Miraluka is blind but perceives the world through the Force, ignoring concealment from darkness.

structuralTraits.name: Force Sensitivity
structuralTraits.description: A Miraluka gains the Force Sensitivity feat at 1st level.
